Sql.query: insert into dpo_medicion96( dpomedcodi, dpotmecodi, dpotdtcodi, dpomedfecha, vergrpcodi, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, h7, h8, h9, h10, h11, h12, h13, h14, h15, h16, h17, h18, h19, h20, h21, h22, h23, h24, h25, h26, h27, h28, h29, h30, h31, h32, h33, h34, h35, h36, h37, h38, h39, h40, h41, h42, h43, h44, h45, h46, h47, h48, h49, h50, h51, h52, h53, h54, h55, h56, h57, h58, h59, h60, h61, h62, h63, h64, h65, h66, h67, h68, h69, h70, h71, h72, h73, h74, h75, h76, h77, h78, h79, h80, h81, h82, h83, h84, h85, h86, h87, h88, h89, h90, h91, h92, h93, h94, h95, h96, dpomedusucreacion, dpomedfeccreacion, dpomedusumodificacion, dpomedfecmodificacion ) values( :dpomedcodi, :dpotmecodi, :dpotdtcodi, :dpomedfecha, :vergrpcodi, :h1, :h2, :h3, :h4, :h5, :h6, :h7, :h8, :h9, :h10, :h11, :h12, :h13, :h14, :h15, :h16, :h17, :h18, :h19, :h20, :h21, :h22, :h23, :h24, :h25, :h26, :h27, :h28, :h29, :h30, :h31, :h32, :h33, :h34, :h35, :h36, :h37, :h38, :h39, :h40, :h41, :h42, :h43, :h44, :h45, :h46, :h47, :h48, :h49, :h50, :h51, :h52, :h53, :h54, :h55, :h56, :h57, :h58, :h59, :h60, :h61, :h62, :h63, :h64, :h65, :h66, :h67, :h68, :h69, :h70, :h71, :h72, :h73, :h74, :h75, :h76, :h77, :h78, :h79, :h80, :h81, :h82, :h83, :h84, :h85, :h86, :h87, :h88, :h89, :h90, :h91, :h92, :h93, :h94, :h95, :h96, :dpomedusucreacion, :dpomedfeccreacion, :dpomedusumodificacion, :dpomedfecmodificacion )
delete from dpo_medicion96 where dpomedcodi = :dpomedcodi and dpotmecodi = :dpotmecodi and dpotdtcodi = :dpotdtcodi and vergrpcodi = :vergrpcodi and dpomedfecha = :dpomedfecha
delete from dpo_medicion96 where vergrpcodi = :vergrpcodi

select dpomedcodi, dpotmecodi, dpotdtcodi, dpomedfecha, vergrpcodi, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, h7, h8, h9, h10, h11, h12, h13, h14, h15, h16, h17, h18, h19, h20, h21, h22, h23, h24, h25, h26, h27, h28, h29, h30, h31, h32, h33, h34, h35, h36, h37, h38, h39, h40, h41, h42, h43, h44, h45, h46, h47, h48, h49, h50, h51, h52, h53, h54, h55, h56, h57, h58, h59, h60, h61, h62, h63, h64, h65, h66, h67, h68, h69, h70, h71, h72, h73, h74, h75, h76, h77, h78, h79, h80, h81, h82, h83, h84, h85, h86, h87, h88, h89, h90, h91, h92, h93, h94, h95, h96, dpomedusucreacion, dpomedfeccreacion, dpomedusumodificacion, dpomedfecmodificacion from dpo_medicion96

select dpomedcodi, dpotmecodi, dpotdtcodi, dpomedfecha, vergrpcodi, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, h7, h8, h9, h10, h11, h12, h13, h14, h15, h16, h17, h18, h19, h20, h21, h22, h23, h24, h25, h26, h27, h28, h29, h30, h31, h32, h33, h34, h35, h36, h37, h38, h39, h40, h41, h42, h43, h44, h45, h46, h47, h48, h49, h50, h51, h52, h53, h54, h55, h56, h57, h58, h59, h60, h61, h62, h63, h64, h65, h66, h67, h68, h69, h70, h71, h72, h73, h74, h75, h76, h77, h78, h79, h80, h81, h82, h83, h84, h85, h86, h87, h88, h89, h90, h91, h92, h93, h94, h95, h96, dpomedusucreacion, dpomedfeccreacion, dpomedusumodificacion, dpomedfecmodificacion from dpo_medicion96 where dpomedcodi = {0} and dpotmecodi = {1} and dpotdtcodi = {2} and vergrpcodi = {3} and dpomedfecha between to_date('{4}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') and to_date('{5}', 'DD/MM/YYYY')

select dpomedcodi, dpotmecodi, dpotdtcodi, dpomedfecha, vergrpcodi, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, h7, h8, h9, h10, h11, h12, h13, h14, h15, h16, h17, h18, h19, h20, h21, h22, h23, h24, h25, h26, h27, h28, h29, h30, h31, h32, h33, h34, h35, h36, h37, h38, h39, h40, h41, h42, h43, h44, h45, h46, h47, h48, h49, h50, h51, h52, h53, h54, h55, h56, h57, h58, h59, h60, h61, h62, h63, h64, h65, h66, h67, h68, h69, h70, h71, h72, h73, h74, h75, h76, h77, h78, h79, h80, h81, h82, h83, h84, h85, h86, h87, h88, h89, h90, h91, h92, h93, h94, h95, h96, dpomedusucreacion, dpomedfeccreacion, dpomedusumodificacion, dpomedfecmodificacion from dpo_medicion96 where dpotmecodi = {0} and dpotdtcodi = {1} and vergrpcodi = {2} and dpomedfecha between to_date('{3}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') and to_date('{4}', 'DD/MM/YYYY')

select dpomedcodi, dpotmecodi, dpotdtcodi, dpomedfecha, vergrpcodi, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, h7, h8, h9, h10, h11, h12, h13, h14, h15, h16, h17, h18, h19, h20, h21, h22, h23, h24, h25, h26, h27, h28, h29, h30, h31, h32, h33, h34, h35, h36, h37, h38, h39, h40, h41, h42, h43, h44, h45, h46, h47, h48, h49, h50, h51, h52, h53, h54, h55, h56, h57, h58, h59, h60, h61, h62, h63, h64, h65, h66, h67, h68, h69, h70, h71, h72, h73, h74, h75, h76, h77, h78, h79, h80, h81, h82, h83, h84, h85, h86, h87, h88, h89, h90, h91, h92, h93, h94, h95, h96, dpomedusucreacion, dpomedfeccreacion, dpomedusumodificacion, dpomedfecmodificacion from dpo_medicion96 where dpomedcodi in ({0}) and dpotmecodi = {1} and dpotdtcodi = {2} and vergrpcodi = {3} and to_char(dpomedfecha, 'yyyy') = '{4}' and to_char(dpomedfecha, 'MM') in ({5})

select pto.ptomedicodi dpomedcodi, grp.medifecha dpomedfecha, grp.h1 H2, grp.h2 H4, grp.h3 H6, grp.h4 H8, grp.h5 H10, grp.h6 H12, grp.h7 H14, grp.h8 H16, grp.h9 H18, grp.h10 H20, grp.h11 H22, grp.h12 H24, grp.h13 H26, grp.h14 H28, grp.h15 H30, grp.h16 H32, grp.h17 H34, grp.h18 H36, grp.h19 H38, grp.h20 H40, grp.h21 H42, grp.h22 H44, grp.h23 H46, grp.h24 H48, grp.h25 H50, grp.h26 H52, grp.h27 H54, grp.h28 H56, grp.h29 H58, grp.h30 H60, grp.h31 H62, grp.h32 H64, grp.h33 H66, grp.h34 H68, grp.h35 H70, grp.h36 H72, grp.h37 H74, grp.h38 H76, grp.h39 H78, grp.h40 H80, grp.h41 H82, grp.h42 H84, grp.h43 H86, grp.h44 H88, grp.h45 H90, grp.h46 H92, grp.h47 H94, grp.h48 H96 from prn_mediciongrp grp join me_ptomedicion pto on grp.grupocodi = pto.grupocodi where prnmgrtipo = 1 and medifecha = to_date('{0}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') and vergrpcodi = {1}

select pto.ptomedicodi dpomedcodi, grp.grupocodi, medifecha dpomedfecha, nvl(sum(h1),0) h2, nvl(sum(h2),0) h4, nvl(sum(h3),0) h6, nvl(sum(h4),0) h8, nvl(sum(h5),0) h10, nvl(sum(h6),0) h12, nvl(sum(h7),0) h14, nvl(sum(h8),0) h16, nvl(sum(h9),0) h18, nvl(sum(h10),0) h20, nvl(sum(h11),0) h22, nvl(sum(h12),0) h24, nvl(sum(h13),0) h26, nvl(sum(h14),0) h28, nvl(sum(h15),0) h30, nvl(sum(h16),0) h32, nvl(sum(h17),0) h34, nvl(sum(h18),0) h36, nvl(sum(h19),0) h38, nvl(sum(h20),0) h40, nvl(sum(h21),0) h42, nvl(sum(h22),0) h44, nvl(sum(h23),0) h46, nvl(sum(h24),0) h48, nvl(sum(h25),0) h50, nvl(sum(h26),0) h52, nvl(sum(h27),0) h54, nvl(sum(h28),0) h56, nvl(sum(h29),0) h58, nvl(sum(h30),0) h60, nvl(sum(h31),0) h62, nvl(sum(h32),0) h64, nvl(sum(h33),0) h66, nvl(sum(h34),0) h68, nvl(sum(h35),0) h70, nvl(sum(h36),0) h72, nvl(sum(h37),0) h74, nvl(sum(h38),0) h76, nvl(sum(h39),0) h78, nvl(sum(h40),0) h80, nvl(sum(h41),0) h82, nvl(sum(h42),0) h84, nvl(sum(h43),0) h86, nvl(sum(h44),0) h88, nvl(sum(h45),0) h90, nvl(sum(h46),0) h92, nvl(sum(h47),0) h94, nvl(sum(h48),0) h96 from prn_mediciongrp grp left join me_ptomedicion pto on pto.grupocodi = grp.grupocodi and (pto.origlectcodi = 18) and (pto.ptomediestado = 'A') where grp.grupocodi in ({0}) and prnmgrtipo in ({1})and medifecha = to_date('{2}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') and grp.vergrpcodi in ({3}) group by pto.ptomedicodi, grp.grupocodi, medifecha

select dpomedcodi, dpomedfecha, nvl(sum(h2),0) h2, nvl(sum(h4),0) h4, nvl(sum(h6),0) h6, nvl(sum(h8),0) h8, nvl(sum(h10),0) h10, nvl(sum(h12),0) h12, nvl(sum(h14),0) h14, nvl(sum(h16),0) h16, nvl(sum(h18),0) h18, nvl(sum(h20),0) h20, nvl(sum(h22),0) h22, nvl(sum(h24),0) h24, nvl(sum(h26),0) h26, nvl(sum(h28),0) h28, nvl(sum(h30),0) h30, nvl(sum(h32),0) h32, nvl(sum(h34),0) h34, nvl(sum(h36),0) h36, nvl(sum(h38),0) h38, nvl(sum(h40),0) h40, nvl(sum(h42),0) h42, nvl(sum(h44),0) h44, nvl(sum(h46),0) h46, nvl(sum(h48),0) h48, nvl(sum(h50),0) h50, nvl(sum(h52),0) h52, nvl(sum(h54),0) h54, nvl(sum(h56),0) h56, nvl(sum(h58),0) h58, nvl(sum(h60),0) h60, nvl(sum(h62),0) h62, nvl(sum(h64),0) h64, nvl(sum(h66),0) h66, nvl(sum(h68),0) h68, nvl(sum(h70),0) h70, nvl(sum(h72),0) h72, nvl(sum(h74),0) h74, nvl(sum(h76),0) h76, nvl(sum(h78),0) h78, nvl(sum(h80),0) h80, nvl(sum(h82),0) h82, nvl(sum(h84),0) h84, nvl(sum(h86),0) h86, nvl(sum(h88),0) h88, nvl(sum(h90),0) h90, nvl(sum(h92),0) h92, nvl(sum(h94),0) h94, nvl(sum(h96),0) h96 from dpo_medicion96 where dpotdtcodi = {0} and dpotmecodi in ({1}) and vergrpcodi = {2} and dpomedfecha = to_date('{3}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') group by dpomedcodi, dpomedfecha

select dpomedcodi, dpomedfecha, sum(h2) h2, sum(h4) h4, sum(h6) h6, sum(h8) h8, sum(h10) h10, sum(h12) h12, sum(h14) h14, sum(h16) h16, sum(h18) h18, sum(h20) h20, sum(h22) h22, sum(h24) h24, sum(h26) h26, sum(h28) h28, sum(h30) h30, sum(h32) h32, sum(h34) h34, sum(h36) h36, sum(h38) h38, sum(h40) h40, sum(h42) h42, sum(h44) h44, sum(h46) h46, sum(h48) h48, sum(h50) h50, sum(h52) h52, sum(h54) h54, sum(h56) h56, sum(h58) h58, sum(h60) h60, sum(h62) h62, sum(h64) h64, sum(h66) h66, sum(h68) h68, sum(h70) h70, sum(h72) h72, sum(h74) h74, sum(h76) h76, sum(h78) h78, sum(h80) h80, sum(h82) h82, sum(h84) h84, sum(h86) h86, sum(h88) h88, sum(h90) h90, sum(h92) h92, sum(h94) h94, sum(h96) h96 from dpo_medicion96 where dpotdtcodi = {0} and dpotmecodi in ({1}) and vergrpcodi = {2} and dpomedfecha = to_date('{3}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') group by dpomedcodi, dpomedfecha

select dpomedcodi, dpomedfecha, nvl(sum(h2),0) h2, nvl(sum(h4),0) h4, nvl(sum(h6),0) h6, nvl(sum(h8),0) h8, nvl(sum(h10),0) h10, nvl(sum(h12),0) h12, nvl(sum(h14),0) h14, nvl(sum(h16),0) h16, nvl(sum(h18),0) h18, nvl(sum(h20),0) h20, nvl(sum(h22),0) h22, nvl(sum(h24),0) h24, nvl(sum(h26),0) h26, nvl(sum(h28),0) h28, nvl(sum(h30),0) h30, nvl(sum(h32),0) h32, nvl(sum(h34),0) h34, nvl(sum(h36),0) h36, nvl(sum(h38),0) h38, nvl(sum(h40),0) h40, nvl(sum(h42),0) h42, nvl(sum(h44),0) h44, nvl(sum(h46),0) h46, nvl(sum(h48),0) h48, nvl(sum(h50),0) h50, nvl(sum(h52),0) h52, nvl(sum(h54),0) h54, nvl(sum(h56),0) h56, nvl(sum(h58),0) h58, nvl(sum(h60),0) h60, nvl(sum(h62),0) h62, nvl(sum(h64),0) h64, nvl(sum(h66),0) h66, nvl(sum(h68),0) h68, nvl(sum(h70),0) h70, nvl(sum(h72),0) h72, nvl(sum(h74),0) h74, nvl(sum(h76),0) h76, nvl(sum(h78),0) h78, nvl(sum(h80),0) h80, nvl(sum(h82),0) h82, nvl(sum(h84),0) h84, nvl(sum(h86),0) h86, nvl(sum(h88),0) h88, nvl(sum(h90),0) h90, nvl(sum(h92),0) h92, nvl(sum(h94),0) h94, nvl(sum(h96),0) h96 from dpo_medicion96 where dpomedcodi = {0} and dpotdtcodi = {1} and dpotmecodi in ({2}) and vergrpcodi = {3} and dpomedfecha = to_date('{4}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') group by dpomedcodi, dpomedfecha

select dpomedfecha, nvl(sum(h2),0) h2, nvl(sum(h4),0) h4, nvl(sum(h6),0) h6, nvl(sum(h8),0) h8, nvl(sum(h10),0) h10, nvl(sum(h12),0) h12, nvl(sum(h14),0) h14, nvl(sum(h16),0) h16, nvl(sum(h18),0) h18, nvl(sum(h20),0) h20, nvl(sum(h22),0) h22, nvl(sum(h24),0) h24, nvl(sum(h26),0) h26, nvl(sum(h28),0) h28, nvl(sum(h30),0) h30, nvl(sum(h32),0) h32, nvl(sum(h34),0) h34, nvl(sum(h36),0) h36, nvl(sum(h38),0) h38, nvl(sum(h40),0) h40, nvl(sum(h42),0) h42, nvl(sum(h44),0) h44, nvl(sum(h46),0) h46, nvl(sum(h48),0) h48, nvl(sum(h50),0) h50, nvl(sum(h52),0) h52, nvl(sum(h54),0) h54, nvl(sum(h56),0) h56, nvl(sum(h58),0) h58, nvl(sum(h60),0) h60, nvl(sum(h62),0) h62, nvl(sum(h64),0) h64, nvl(sum(h66),0) h66, nvl(sum(h68),0) h68, nvl(sum(h70),0) h70, nvl(sum(h72),0) h72, nvl(sum(h74),0) h74, nvl(sum(h76),0) h76, nvl(sum(h78),0) h78, nvl(sum(h80),0) h80, nvl(sum(h82),0) h82, nvl(sum(h84),0) h84, nvl(sum(h86),0) h86, nvl(sum(h88),0) h88, nvl(sum(h90),0) h90, nvl(sum(h92),0) h92, nvl(sum(h94),0) h94, nvl(sum(h96),0) h96 from dpo_medicion96 where dpomedcodi in ({0}) and dpotdtcodi = {1} and dpotmecodi in ({2}) and vergrpcodi = {3} and dpomedfecha = to_date('{4}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') group by dpomedfecha

select medifecha dpomedfecha, nvl(sum(h1),0) h2, nvl(sum(h2),0) h4, nvl(sum(h3),0) h6, nvl(sum(h4),0) h8, nvl(sum(h5),0) h10, nvl(sum(h6),0) h12, nvl(sum(h7),0) h14, nvl(sum(h8),0) h16, nvl(sum(h9),0) h18, nvl(sum(h10),0) h20, nvl(sum(h11),0) h22, nvl(sum(h12),0) h24, nvl(sum(h13),0) h26, nvl(sum(h14),0) h28, nvl(sum(h15),0) h30, nvl(sum(h16),0) h32, nvl(sum(h17),0) h34, nvl(sum(h18),0) h36, nvl(sum(h19),0) h38, nvl(sum(h20),0) h40, nvl(sum(h21),0) h42, nvl(sum(h22),0) h44, nvl(sum(h23),0) h46, nvl(sum(h24),0) h48, nvl(sum(h25),0) h50, nvl(sum(h26),0) h52, nvl(sum(h27),0) h54, nvl(sum(h28),0) h56, nvl(sum(h29),0) h58, nvl(sum(h30),0) h60, nvl(sum(h31),0) h62, nvl(sum(h32),0) h64, nvl(sum(h33),0) h66, nvl(sum(h34),0) h68, nvl(sum(h35),0) h70, nvl(sum(h36),0) h72, nvl(sum(h37),0) h74, nvl(sum(h38),0) h76, nvl(sum(h39),0) h78, nvl(sum(h40),0) h80, nvl(sum(h41),0) h82, nvl(sum(h42),0) h84, nvl(sum(h43),0) h86, nvl(sum(h44),0) h88, nvl(sum(h45),0) h90, nvl(sum(h46),0) h92, nvl(sum(h47),0) h94, nvl(sum(h48),0) h96 from prn_mediciongrp where grupocodi in ({0}) and prnmgrtipo = 1 and vergrpcodi = {1} and medifecha = to_date('{2}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') group by medifecha

select pto.grupocodibarra dpomedcodi, medifecha dpomedfecha, sum(h1) h2, sum(h2) h4, sum(h3) h6, sum(h4) h8, sum(h5) h10, sum(h6) h12, sum(h7) h14, sum(h8) h16, sum(h9) h18, sum(h10) h20, sum(h11) h22, sum(h12) h24, sum(h13) h26, sum(h14) h28, sum(h15) h30, sum(h16) h32, sum(h17) h34, sum(h18) h36, sum(h19) h38, sum(h20) h40, sum(h21) h42, sum(h22) h44, sum(h23) h46, sum(h24) h48, sum(h25) h50, sum(h26) h52, sum(h27) h54, sum(h28) h56, sum(h29) h58, sum(h30) h60, sum(h31) h62, sum(h32) h64, sum(h33) h66, sum(h34) h68, sum(h35) h70, sum(h36) h72, sum(h37) h74, sum(h38) h76, sum(h39) h78, sum(h40) h80, sum(h41) h82, sum(h42) h84, sum(h43) h86, sum(h44) h88, sum(h45) h90, sum(h46) h92, sum(h47) h94, sum(h48) h96 from me_medicion48 med join( select agr.ptomedicodi, rred.prnredbarracp grupocodibarra from prn_agrupacion agr join prn_puntoagrupacion ptoagr on agr.ptogrpcodi = ptoagr.ptogrpcodi and (ptoagr.ptogrpfechafin = to_date('31/12/9999', 'DD/MM/YYYY')) join me_ptomedicion pto on ptoagr.ptomedicodi = pto.ptomedicodi and (pto.grupocodibarra != -1) join prn_reduccionred rred on pto.grupocodibarra = rred.prnredbarrapm join prn_version pver on rred.prnvercodi = pver.prnvercodi and (pver.prnverestado = 'A') ) pto on med.ptomedicodi = pto.ptomedicodi where med.lectcodi = {1} and med.tipoinfocodi = 1 and med.medifecha = to_date('{2}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') group by pto.grupocodibarra, med.medifecha

select m48.medifecha dpomedfecha, m48.h1 H2, m48.h2 H4, m48.h3 H6, m48.h4 H8, m48.h5 H10, m48.h6 H12, m48.h7 H14, m48.h8 H16, m48.h9 H18, m48.h10 H20, m48.h11 H22, m48.h12 H24, m48.h13 H26, m48.h14 H28, m48.h15 H30, m48.h16 H32, m48.h17 H34, m48.h18 H36, m48.h19 H38, m48.h20 H40, m48.h21 H42, m48.h22 H44, m48.h23 H46, m48.h24 H48, m48.h25 H50, m48.h26 H52, m48.h27 H54, m48.h28 H56, m48.h29 H58, m48.h30 H60, m48.h31 H62, m48.h32 H64, m48.h33 H66, m48.h34 H68, m48.h35 H70, m48.h36 H72, m48.h37 H74, m48.h38 H76, m48.h39 H78, m48.h40 H80, m48.h41 H82, m48.h42 H84, m48.h43 H86, m48.h44 H88, m48.h45 H90, m48.h46 H92, m48.h47 H94, m48.h48 H96 from cp_medicion48 m48 inner join cp_recurso re on re.recurcodi = m48.recurcodi and re.topcodi in({0}) and re.recurestado = 1 where m48.medifecha = TO_DATE('{2}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') and m48.topcodi in({0}) and m48.srestcodi in({1}) order by m48.medifecha asc

select medifecha dpomedfecha, nvl(sum(h1),0) h2, nvl(sum(h2),0) h4, nvl(sum(h3),0) h6, nvl(sum(h4),0) h8, nvl(sum(h5),0) h10, nvl(sum(h6),0) h12, nvl(sum(h7),0) h14, nvl(sum(h8),0) h16, nvl(sum(h9),0) h18, nvl(sum(h10),0) h20, nvl(sum(h11),0) h22, nvl(sum(h12),0) h24, nvl(sum(h13),0) h26, nvl(sum(h14),0) h28, nvl(sum(h15),0) h30, nvl(sum(h16),0) h32, nvl(sum(h17),0) h34, nvl(sum(h18),0) h36, nvl(sum(h19),0) h38, nvl(sum(h20),0) h40, nvl(sum(h21),0) h42, nvl(sum(h22),0) h44, nvl(sum(h23),0) h46, nvl(sum(h24),0) h48, nvl(sum(h25),0) h50, nvl(sum(h26),0) h52, nvl(sum(h27),0) h54, nvl(sum(h28),0) h56, nvl(sum(h29),0) h58, nvl(sum(h30),0) h60, nvl(sum(h31),0) h62, nvl(sum(h32),0) h64, nvl(sum(h33),0) h66, nvl(sum(h34),0) h68, nvl(sum(h35),0) h70, nvl(sum(h36),0) h72, nvl(sum(h37),0) h74, nvl(sum(h38),0) h76, nvl(sum(h39),0) h78, nvl(sum(h40),0) h80, nvl(sum(h41),0) h82, nvl(sum(h42),0) h84, nvl(sum(h43),0) h86, nvl(sum(h44),0) h88, nvl(sum(h45),0) h90, nvl(sum(h46),0) h92, nvl(sum(h47),0) h94, nvl(sum(h48),0) h96 from me_medicion48 where lectcodi = {0} and tipoinfocodi = {1} and ptomedicodi in ({2}) and medifecha >= to_date('{3}','DD/MM/YYYY') and medifecha <= to_date('{4}','DD/MM/YYYY') group by medifecha

select m48.medifecha dpomedfecha, nvl(sum(m48.h1),0) h2, nvl(sum(m48.h2),0) h4, nvl(sum(m48.h3),0) h6, nvl(sum(m48.h4),0) h8, nvl(sum(m48.h5),0) h10, nvl(sum(m48.h6),0) h12, nvl(sum(m48.h7),0) h14, nvl(sum(m48.h8),0) h16, nvl(sum(m48.h9),0) h18, nvl(sum(m48.h10),0) h20, nvl(sum(m48.h11),0) h22, nvl(sum(m48.h12),0) h24, nvl(sum(m48.h13),0) h26, nvl(sum(m48.h14),0) h28, nvl(sum(m48.h15),0) h30, nvl(sum(m48.h16),0) h32, nvl(sum(m48.h17),0) h34, nvl(sum(m48.h18),0) h36, nvl(sum(m48.h19),0) h38, nvl(sum(m48.h20),0) h40, nvl(sum(m48.h21),0) h42, nvl(sum(m48.h22),0) h44, nvl(sum(m48.h23),0) h46, nvl(sum(m48.h24),0) h48, nvl(sum(m48.h25),0) h50, nvl(sum(m48.h26),0) h52, nvl(sum(m48.h27),0) h54, nvl(sum(m48.h28),0) h56, nvl(sum(m48.h29),0) h58, nvl(sum(m48.h30),0) h60, nvl(sum(m48.h31),0) h62, nvl(sum(m48.h32),0) h64, nvl(sum(m48.h33),0) h66, nvl(sum(m48.h34),0) h68, nvl(sum(m48.h35),0) h70, nvl(sum(m48.h36),0) h72, nvl(sum(m48.h37),0) h74, nvl(sum(m48.h38),0) h76, nvl(sum(m48.h39),0) h78, nvl(sum(m48.h40),0) h80, nvl(sum(m48.h41),0) h82, nvl(sum(m48.h42),0) h84, nvl(sum(m48.h43),0) h86, nvl(sum(m48.h44),0) h88, nvl(sum(m48.h45),0) h90, nvl(sum(m48.h46),0) h92, nvl(sum(m48.h47),0) h94, nvl(sum(m48.h48),0) h96 from cp_medicion48 m48 inner join cp_recurso re on re.recurcodi = m48.recurcodi and re.topcodi in({0}) and re.recurestado = 1 where m48.medifecha = TO_DATE('{2}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') and m48.topcodi in({0}) and m48.srestcodi in({1}) group by medifecha

select medifecha dpomedfecha, nvl(sum(h1),0) h2, nvl(sum(h2),0) h4, nvl(sum(h3),0) h6, nvl(sum(h4),0) h8, nvl(sum(h5),0) h10, nvl(sum(h6),0) h12, nvl(sum(h7),0) h14, nvl(sum(h8),0) h16, nvl(sum(h9),0) h18, nvl(sum(h10),0) h20, nvl(sum(h11),0) h22, nvl(sum(h12),0) h24, nvl(sum(h13),0) h26, nvl(sum(h14),0) h28, nvl(sum(h15),0) h30, nvl(sum(h16),0) h32, nvl(sum(h17),0) h34, nvl(sum(h18),0) h36, nvl(sum(h19),0) h38, nvl(sum(h20),0) h40, nvl(sum(h21),0) h42, nvl(sum(h22),0) h44, nvl(sum(h23),0) h46, nvl(sum(h24),0) h48, nvl(sum(h25),0) h50, nvl(sum(h26),0) h52, nvl(sum(h27),0) h54, nvl(sum(h28),0) h56, nvl(sum(h29),0) h58, nvl(sum(h30),0) h60, nvl(sum(h31),0) h62, nvl(sum(h32),0) h64, nvl(sum(h33),0) h66, nvl(sum(h34),0) h68, nvl(sum(h35),0) h70, nvl(sum(h36),0) h72, nvl(sum(h37),0) h74, nvl(sum(h38),0) h76, nvl(sum(h39),0) h78, nvl(sum(h40),0) h80, nvl(sum(h41),0) h82, nvl(sum(h42),0) h84, nvl(sum(h43),0) h86, nvl(sum(h44),0) h88, nvl(sum(h45),0) h90, nvl(sum(h46),0) h92, nvl(sum(h47),0) h94, nvl(sum(h48),0) h96 from me_medicion48 where lectcodi = {0} and tipoinfocodi = {1} and ptomedicodi in ({2}) and medifecha >= to_date('{3}','DD/MM/YYYY') and medifecha <= to_date('{4}','DD/MM/YYYY') group by medifecha
